query:
INSERT INTO workflow_templates (name, description, category, triggerType, triggerConfig, workflowData, tags, isPublic) VALUES
('Welcome Series - 3 Emails', 'A 3-email welcome sequence for new students joining a cohort. Sends welcome email immediately, followed by getting started tips after 1 day, and course overview after 3 days.', 'welcome', 'cohort_join', '{}', '{"nodes":[{"id":"trigger","type":"trigger","data":{"label":"Student Joins Cohort"}},{"id":"email1","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Welcome to the Course!","template":"welcome_email"}},{"id":"wait1","type":"wait","data":{"duration":1,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email2","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Getting Started Tips","template":"getting_started"}},{"id":"wait2","type":"wait","data":{"duration":2,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email3","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Course Overview","template":"course_overview"}}],"edges":[{"source":"trigger","target":"email1"},{"source":"email1","target":"wait1"},{"source":"wait1","target":"email2"},{"source":"email2","target":"wait2"},{"source":"wait2","target":"email3"}]}', '["welcome","onboarding","new-students"]', TRUE),

('Course Reminder - Weekly', 'Weekly reminder emails for students who haven''t completed their lessons. Checks progress and sends personalized reminders.', 'course', 'date_based', '{"schedule":"weekly","day":"monday","time":"09:00"}', '{"nodes":[{"id":"trigger","type":"trigger","data":{"label":"Every Monday 9 AM"}},{"id":"condition","type":"condition","data":{"check":"lesson_incomplete"}},{"id":"email","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Don''t forget your weekly lesson!","template":"course_reminder"}}],"edges":[{"source":"trigger","target":"condition"},{"source":"condition","target":"email","label":"incomplete"}]}', '["reminder","course","weekly"]', TRUE),

('Re-engagement Campaign', 'Win back inactive students with a 3-email re-engagement sequence. Targets students who haven''t logged in for 14 days.', 'engagement', 'date_based', '{"inactivityDays":14}', '{"nodes":[{"id":"trigger","type":"trigger","data":{"label":"14 Days Inactive"}},{"id":"email1","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"We miss you!","template":"reengagement_1"}},{"id":"wait1","type":"wait","data":{"duration":3,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"condition","type":"condition","data":{"check":"still_inactive"}},{"id":"email2","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Special offer inside","template":"reengagement_2"}},{"id":"wait2","type":"wait","data":{"duration":4,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email3","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Last chance to rejoin","template":"reengagement_3"}}],"edges":[{"source":"trigger","target":"email1"},{"source":"email1","target":"wait1"},{"source":"wait1","target":"condition"},{"source":"condition","target":"email2","label":"inactive"},{"source":"email2","target":"wait2"},{"source":"wait2","target":"email3"}]}', '["re-engagement","inactive","winback"]', TRUE),

('Certification Preparation', 'Help students prepare for certification exams with a structured email sequence covering study tips, practice tests, and exam day reminders.', 'certification', 'enrollment', '{"courseType":"certification"}', '{"nodes":[{"id":"trigger","type":"trigger","data":{"label":"Enrolls in Cert Course"}},{"id":"email1","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Your Certification Journey Begins","template":"cert_welcome"}},{"id":"wait1","type":"wait","data":{"duration":7,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email2","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Study Tips & Resources","template":"cert_study_tips"}},{"id":"wait2","type":"wait","data":{"duration":7,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email3","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Practice Test Available","template":"cert_practice"}},{"id":"wait3","type":"wait","data":{"duration":7,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email4","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Exam Day Preparation","template":"cert_exam_prep"}}],"edges":[{"source":"trigger","target":"email1"},{"source":"email1","target":"wait1"},{"source":"wait1","target":"email2"},{"source":"email2","target":"wait2"},{"source":"wait2","target":"email3"},{"source":"email3","target":"wait3"},{"source":"wait3","target":"email4"}]}', '["certification","exam","preparation"]', TRUE),

('Course Completion Celebration', 'Celebrate student achievements when they complete a course. Sends congratulations email and encourages next steps.', 'course', 'completion', '{}', '{"nodes":[{"id":"trigger","type":"trigger","data":{"label":"Course Completed"}},{"id":"email1","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Congratulations on completing the course!","template":"completion_celebration"}},{"id":"wait1","type":"wait","data":{"duration":1,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email2","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"What''s next for you?","template":"next_steps"}}],"edges":[{"source":"trigger","target":"email1"},{"source":"email1","target":"wait1"},{"source":"wait1","target":"email2"}]}', '["completion","celebration","achievement"]', TRUE),

('Nurture Campaign - Educational', 'Long-term nurture campaign that delivers valuable educational content over 8 weeks to build engagement and trust.', 'nurture', 'manual', '{}', '{"nodes":[{"id":"trigger","type":"trigger","data":{"label":"Manual Trigger"}},{"id":"email1","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Educational Tip #1","template":"nurture_tip_1"}},{"id":"wait1","type":"wait","data":{"duration":7,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email2","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Educational Tip #2","template":"nurture_tip_2"}},{"id":"wait2","type":"wait","data":{"duration":7,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email3","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Educational Tip #3","template":"nurture_tip_3"}},{"id":"wait3","type":"wait","data":{"duration":7,"unit":"days"}},{"id":"email4","type":"send_email","data":{"subject":"Educational Tip #4","template":"nurture_tip_4"}}],"edges":[{"source":"trigger","target":"email1"},{"source":"email1","target":"wait1"},{"source":"wait1","target":"email2"},{"source":"email2","target":"wait2"},{"source":"wait2","target":"email3"},{"source":"email3","target":"wait3"},{"source":"wait3","target":"email4"}]}', '["nurture","educational","long-term"]', TRUE)
command:
